sentences.sContent: It also recommends using multiple micronutrient powders to fortify foods for children aged between 6 and 23 months.
sentences.sContent_eng: It also recommends using multiple micronutrient powders to fortify foods for children aged between 6 and 23 months.
sentences.sCn: 还建议利用多种微量营养素粉来强化年龄在6个月和23个月之间儿童的食物。

sentences.sContent: This will involve improving access to nutritious food, to micronutrient supplementation and in many places to preventing infections as well.
sentences.sContent_eng: This will involve improving access to nutritious food, to micronutrient supplementation and in many places to preventing infections as well.
sentences.sCn: 这将包括改善营养食品和微量营养素补充品的获得，在许多地方还包括预防感染。

sentences.sContent: Nevertheless, our study suggests that vitamin A supplementation can reduce infant mortality in regions where this micronutrient deficiency is common.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nevertheless, our study suggests that vitamin A supplementation can reduce infant mortality in regions where this micronutrient deficiency is common.
sentences.sCn: 然而，我们的研究表明，维生素A的补充可能减少这种微量营养素缺乏的常见地区的婴儿死亡率。

trans.tranOther: any substance, such as a vitamin or trace element, essential for healthy growth and development but required only in minute amounts
